## PoiTableManager.getPoiTable() method

Retrieve a \[\[PoiTable\]\] by name.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  poiTableName | string \| undefined | Name of the \[\[PoiTable\]\]. |
